title: Tomehane!: Suzuri Koukou Shodou-bu
original_name: とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
sinopse:
Tales of a high school calligraphy club.

Yukari Ooe, a boy who returns to Japan from Canada, finds himself joining his new high school's calligraphy club; without enough students, the tiny club is in danger of being abolished.

(Source: ANN)
